casebody.data:
LONG ISLAND SHIPYARD, Inc., Appellee, v. The Motor Cruiser SEA SCAMP, Appellant. No. 261. Circuit Court of Appeals, Second Circuit. March 7, 1932. Francis Finkelhor and Haaren & Barrett, all of New York City, for appellant. Vail G. Tooker, of Port Jefferson, N. Y. (Charles A. Van Hagen, Jr., of New York City, of counsel), for appellee.

Before L. HAND, SWAN, and CHASE, Circuit Judges.

PER CURIAM.

Decree affirmed.
